cu.explanation_en: Setting the SST to a negative value of -1 will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the SST must be non-negative.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of downlink symbols to an out-of-range value of 20 will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the value exceeds the maximum allowed for the slot.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行符號數設定為超出範圍的值 20 會導致 gNB 在初始化期間失敗，因為該值超過時隙允許的最大值。
